ci_support_linux_64_python3.10.____cpyth:
c_stdlib:
- sysroot
c_stdlib_version:
- '2.17'
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cxx_compiler:
- gxx
cxx_compiler_version:
- '14'
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  python:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
python:
- 3.10.* *_cpython
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.description: A CPython extension module to access Cling through cppyy-backend.
about.summary: CPython-C++ bindings interface based on Cling/LLVM

script: ls `python -c "import site; [print(p) for p in site.getsitepackages()]"`/libcppyy*.so
test -f $PREFIX/include/python*/CPyCppyy/API.h
ls `python -c "import site; [print(p) for p in site.getsitepackages()]"`/libcppyy*.so
test -f $PREFIX/include/python*/CPyCppyy/API.h

raw_meta_yaml:
schema_version: 1

context:
  version: 1.13.0

package:
  name: cpycppyy
  version: ${{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/c/cpycppyy/CPyCppyy-${{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 783b2a8e6addbfb21fd4f49c3b61cca887e692d0a59073ab6c0130f365ca3b9c
  patches:
    - 0001-use-host-but-not-build-cflags.patch

build:
  number: 0
  skip: win
  script: ${{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps -vv

requirements:
  build:
    - if: build_platform != target_platform
      then:
        - python
        - cross-python_${{ target_platform }}
    - ${{ compiler('cxx') }}
    - ${{ stdlib("c") }}
  host:
    - python
    - pip
    - setuptools
    # cppyy-cling, cppyy-backend, cpycppyy and cppyy are essentially a single package, so we always pin exactly between these.
    - cppyy-backend ==1.15.3
    # cppyy-cling, cppyy-backend, cpycppyy and cppyy are essentially a single package, so we always pin exactly between these.
    - cppyy-cling ==6.32.8
  run:
    - python
    # cppyy-cling, cppyy-backend, cpycppyy and cppyy are essentially a single package, so we always pin exactly between these.
    - cppyy-backend ==1.15.3
    # cppyy-cling, cppyy-backend, cpycppyy and cppyy are essentially a single package, so we always pin exactly between these.
    - cppyy-cling ==6.32.8

tests:
  - script:
      - ls `python -c "import site; [print(p) for p in site.getsitepackages()]"`/libcppyy*.so
      # Ensure that API.h was installed into CPyCppyy and not cpycppyy, see https://github.com/wlav/cppyy/issues/292
      - test -f $PREFIX/include/python*/CPyCppyy/API.h


about:
  license: BSD-3-Clause
  license_file: LICENSE.txt
  summary: CPython-C++ bindings interface based on Cling/LLVM
  description: |
    A CPython extension module to access Cling through cppyy-backend.
  homepage: https://pypi.org/project/CPyCppyy/
  repository: https://github.com/wlav/CPyCppyy
  documentation: http://cppyy.readthedocs.io/

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - saraedum
    - isuruf
